channel.title: I need help logging into servers, I can log in on 4everscape just fine.No others
channel.description:
I'm so very sorry to ask this...really.I've been all over the forums and can't find the answer to this particular one.
Alright I have Mopar 3.2(interesting if he made a Hemi version eh?).
I copy/paste the IP for 4everscape and get in no problem. If I do the same for another server though I get the "Error connecting" message.And I have tried a bunch of them.Any with a different port I enter the port number in the port area in "File". I have downloaded Hamachi but I can't understand how these two interact with each other.I have it running now.Is it just so people can tell each other what IP to go on?Or does it actually work like X-fire and join a game for you?
Also on the server advertisment page I can't tell which are Hamachi servers and which are not.
Thanks so much for your time and I hope you can help.

item.title: I need help logging into servers, I can log in on 4everscape just fine.No others
item.dc:creator: @heliarc heliarc
item.description:
@heliarc wrote:

No it’s not that at all.I always have the server checker running and it’s accurate.What it is I cant get into these ones that have either a regular looking I.P. number and ones that say “No-ip”.If it says blahblahgame.servergame.com or something I can get into it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help logging into servers, I can log in on 4everscape just fine.No others
